text: Jarbom Gamlin (16 April 1961 â€“ 30 November 2014) was an Indian politician. He was the leader of the Indian National Congress political party in Arunachal Pradesh. He was the Chief Minister of Arunachal Pradesh serving from May 2011 through October 2011. Gamlin died from liver thrombosis in Gurgaon, Assam, aged 53. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Indian politicians by state or union territory Category:People from Arunachal Pradesh
title: Jarbom Gamlin
